***словарь.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словарь.html>слова́рь</a> (6098)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvo</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">word</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-арь</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-árʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словарь.html>слова́рь</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovárʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словарь.html>словаря́</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словарь.html>словари́</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словарь.html>словаре́й</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li> <a href = vnd.unilang:лексикон.html>лексико́н</a></li>

</body>
***словеса.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словеса.html>словеса́</a> (28922)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Archaic plural of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvo</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">word</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (originally an <i>s</i>-stem).
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словеса.html>словеса́</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovesá</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr> | <abbr title="plural number">pl</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словеса.html>слове́с</a></b>, <i>plural only</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">ironic | or | literary</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> words, text, verbiage</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slóvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словечко.html>слове́чко</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slovéčko</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесный.html>слове́сный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slovésnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">словник</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slóvnik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="словесник (page does not exist)">словесник</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slovésnik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>са</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> мн. lt;<a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> | 1c^gt;  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:еда.html>е́д</a>. ч. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуются</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-слов-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ес</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***словесность.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словесность.html>слове́сность</a> (13414)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесный.html>слове́сный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slovésnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ость</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесность.html>слове́сность</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovésnostʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесность.html>слове́сности</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесность.html>слове́сности</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесность.html>слове́сностей</a></b>)

<ol><li>literature</li>

<li>philology</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

***словесный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словесный.html>слове́сный</a> (8870)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic">Old Church Slavonic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8Aamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="словесьнъ (page does not exist)">словесьнъ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slovesĭnŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словесный.html>слове́сный</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovésnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>verbal, oral</li>
<li>philological</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slóvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вес.html>вес</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1*a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-слов-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ес-н</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:относиться.html>относя́щийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́ву</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:выражать.html>выража́емый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>слова́ми</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>слова́х</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:май.html>ма́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>того́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>года</a> Писемский <a href = vnd.unilang:прислать.html>присла́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:царь.html>царю</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***словечко.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словечко.html>слове́чко</a> (7351)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словцо.html>словцо́</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slovcó</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ко</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ko</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словечко.html>слове́чко</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovéčko</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словечко.html>слове́чка</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словечко.html>слове́чки</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словечко.html>слове́чек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Diminutive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: word</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вече.html>ве́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ко.html>ко</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*a(1)  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).

***словно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a> (258)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slóvno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>like, as if
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дерево.html>Дере́вья</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:крепкий.html>кре́пкие</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></b> саманы, затвердевшие <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:горячий.html>горя́чим</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:солнце.html>со́лнцем</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Derévʹja krépkije, <b>slóvno</b> samány, zatverdévšije pod gorjáčim sólncem.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">The trees are sturdy, <b>like</b> adobe bricks hardened under the hot sun.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>as it were
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:небо.html>Не́бо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ло</a> бело/бело, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пурга.html>пурге́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Nébo býlo beló/bélo, <b>slóvno</b> v purgé.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">The sky was white, <b>as it were</b> in a snowstorm.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slóvno</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/w/index.php?title=it_seemsamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="it seems (page does not exist)">it seems</a> (that), <a href="/w/index.php?title=it_looks_likeamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="it looks like (page does not exist)">it looks like</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">for expressing conditional, imaginary, or apparent things or action</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><i><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́дел</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:единорог.html>единоро́га</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:летать.html>лета́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:небо.html>не́бе</a>.</i></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><i>Ja <b>slóvno</b> vídel jedinoróga, kotóryj letál na nébe.</i></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><i><b>It looked like</b> to me that I was seeing a unicorn that was flying in the sky.</i></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>The meaning of <b><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">by</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b> is already implied. Hence <b><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvno by</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b> is the same as <b><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></b>.</li>
<li>Due to the <i>invisible</i> <b><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">by</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b> in the conjunction and particle <b><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></b>, any finite verb governed by either of these usages must be in the past tense.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">as if, as it were</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:будто.html>бу́дто</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">búdto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kak</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:будто.html>бу́дто</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kak búdto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:точно.html>то́чно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">tóčno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">it seems (that)</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:казаться.html>ка́жется</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kážetsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:казаться.html>кажи́сь</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kažísʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:никак.html>ника́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nikák</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́в</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:союз.html>Сою́з</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:также.html>та́кже</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:частица.html>части́ца</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-словно-</b>.
</p>

</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:будто.html>бу́дто</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:будто.html>бу́дто</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:точно.html>то́чно</a>,</li>

</body>
***слово.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a> (102)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=17" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*slȍvo</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">word</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*ḱléwos</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">fame</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=19" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slóvo</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>слова</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>слова</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>word, term
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:грубый.html>гру́бое</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">grúboje <b>slóvo</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">harsh <b>word</b></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:устаревший.html>устаре́вшее</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">ustarévšeje <b>slóvo</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">obsolete <b>word</b></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>speech, address</li>
<li>promise
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:нарушать.html>наруша́ть</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">narušátʹ <b>slóvo</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">to break one's word, to go back upon / on one's word (breaking promise or contract)</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=21" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:речь.html>речь</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">rečʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>язы́к</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">jazýk</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<p><i>Verbs</i>
</p>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="пустословить (page does not exist)">пустословить</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pustoslóvitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:обусловить.html>обусло́вить</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obuslóvitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D1%83%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="суесловить (page does not exist)">суесловить</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">sujeslóvitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<p><i>ETC</i>
</p>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словно.html>сло́вно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slóvno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
</div>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1c  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка). | <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́ниях</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>ти́па</a> «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i>», «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i>», «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́ву</a></i>» <a href = vnd.unilang:ударение.html>ударе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падать.html>па́дать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́г</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a> «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i>» <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:превращаться.html>превраща́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> клитику.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:встречаться.html>Встреча́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:также.html>та́кже</a> | <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;">книжн.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:либо.html>ли́бо</a> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;">ирон.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> | <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:схема.html>схе́ме</a> 1f': <i><span title="<a href = vnd.unilang:множественный.html>мно́жественное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>число́</a>" style="border-bottom: 1px dotted; cursor: help">мн. | ч.</span></i> | — | <i><a href = vnd.unilang:словеса.html>словеса́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:словеса.html>слове́с</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:словеса.html>словеса́х</a></i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-слов-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:речь.html>речь</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>язы́к</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:разговор.html>разгово́р</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:дар.html>дар</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:речь.html>ре́чи</a> <sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-5"> |  2 | </a></sup><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-6" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-6"> |  2 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-7" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-7"> |  2 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-8" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-8"> | ▼ 2 | </a></sup></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:теперь.html>Тепе́рь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стихи.html>стихо́в</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; Иванов, «Пархоменко», <span class="example-date">1939</span> | г.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>Лю́ди</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:горячий.html>горячо́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жестикулировать.html>жестикули́ровали</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:вскакивать.html>вска́кивали</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:место.html>мест</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:просить.html>проси́ли</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***словоохотливый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словоохотливый.html>словоохо́тливый</a> (19804)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:охота.html>охо́та</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">oxóta</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ливый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-livyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словоохотливый.html>словоохо́тливый</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovooxótlivyj</span>) (<i>comparative</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="пословоохотливее (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="словоохотливее (page does not exist)">словоохотливее</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="пословоохотливей (page does not exist)">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)</a><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="словоохотливей (page does not exist)">словоохотливей</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>talkative, loquacious, garrulous</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:словоохотливый.html>словоохо́тливый</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> | — <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="словоохотливее (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">словоохотливее</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="словоохотливей (<a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существовать.html>существу́ет</a>)">словоохотливей</a>.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>--</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BE%D1%85%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:любить.html>лю́бящий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поговорить.html>поговори́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:разговорчивый.html>разгово́рчивый</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словосочетание.html>словосочета́ние</a> (18303)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvo</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">word</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́ние</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">sočetánije</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">combination</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словосочетание.html>словосочета́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovosočetánije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словосочетание.html>словосочета́ния</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словосочетание.html>словосочета́ния</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словосочетание.html>словосочета́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">linguistics</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> word combination, phrase</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>че<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>та́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-слов-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-сочет-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-а-ниj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-е</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:словцо.html>словцо́</a> (16068)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%86%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словцо.html>словцо́</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slovcó</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словцо.html>словца́</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словцо.html>словца́</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:словцо.html>слове́ц</a></b>)

<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Diminutive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">slóvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: word</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%86%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́в</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>цо</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 5*b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).

***слог.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:слог.html>слог</a> (10184)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic">Old East Slavic</a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">сълогъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">sŭlogŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; equivalent to <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">с-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">s-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + the root of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ложить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ložítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слог.html>слог</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">slog</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слог.html>сло́га</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слог.html>сло́ги</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слог.html>слого́в</a></b>, <i>related adjective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">слоговой</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">phonology</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> syllable</li>
<li>style, manner of writing</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:слог.html>слог</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3e  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-слог-</b>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:сложение.html>сложе́ние</a> (15232)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">složítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ение</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-énije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложение.html>сложе́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">složénije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложение.html>сложе́ния</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложение.html>сложе́ния</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложение.html>сложе́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>adding, composing</li>
<li>composition</li>
<li>laying down, resignation</li>
<li>addition <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">arithmetic: process of adding</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li>constitution, build</li></ol>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:складывать.html>скла́дывать</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">skládyvatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">složítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>с-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-лож-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-е</b>  | Тихонов, 2003 | .

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Alternative spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">сложённый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">složónnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:жена.html>жён</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-слож-</b>; суффикс: <b>-енн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***сложить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a> (2808)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">с-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">s-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ложить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ložítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">složítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:складывать.html>скла́дывать</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to lay together, to put together, to pile up, to heap, to stack</li>
<li>to pack up</li>
<li>to add, to sum up</li>
<li>to make, to assemble, to put together</li>
<li><i>song, rhyme</i> to compose, to make up</li>
<li>to fold</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложение.html>сложе́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">složénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">сложённый</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">složónnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложиться.html>сложи́вшийся</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">složívšijsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_2">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=9" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">složítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:слагать.html>слага́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to compose
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ли</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:песня.html>пе́сню</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">pro nevó <b>složíli</b> pésnju</i> ― <span class="e-translation">a song was composed about him</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to take off, to put down
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:себя.html>себя́</a> обязанности/полномочия</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>složítʹ</b> s sebjá objázannosti/polnomóčija</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to resign</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:сложить.html>сложи́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:себя.html>себя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:всякое.html>вся́кую</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ответственность.html>отве́тственность</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>složítʹ</b> s sebjá vsjákuju otvétstvennostʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to abdicate/decline all responsibility</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b>сло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:жить.html>жить</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4c.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:складывать.html>скла́дывать</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>с-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-лож-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
